    Method
    Description
    void
    acceptFriendRequest(Account sender, Account receiver)
    when the receiver accept friend request he will become the sender's subscriber
    void
    rejectFriendRequest(Account user, Account sender)
    when the receiver reject friend request, the sender still will be a receiver's subscriber
    void
    removeFromFriend(Account user, Account friend)
    when the user remove somebody from friend list, the friend, in turn, still will be the user's subscriber until he abandons the subscription

  • Method Details

    • sendFriendRequest

      public void sendFriendRequest(Integer senderId, Integer receiverId)
      sending the friend request and adding the sender to the receiver's subscribers list. Then the sender is available to see the receiver's posts
      Parameters:
      senderId - the sender id
      receiverId - the receiver id

    • acceptFriendRequest

      public void acceptFriendRequest(Account sender, Account receiver)
      when the receiver accept friend request he will become the sender's subscriber
      Parameters:
      sender - the sender
      receiver - the receiver

    • rejectFriendRequest

      public void rejectFriendRequest(Account user, Account sender)
      when the receiver reject friend request, the sender still will be a receiver's subscriber
      Parameters:
      user - the user
      sender - the sender

    • removeFromFriend

      public void removeFromFriend(Account user, Account friend)
      when the user remove somebody from friend list, the friend, in turn, still will be the user's subscriber until he abandons the subscription
      Parameters:
      user - the user
      friend - the friend
